Column Comment.0: SPATIAL DESCRIPTION: The surface and sub-surface description of any object thatoccupies an area, such as a land right, field, facility or area of interest. The surfacedescription may be stated in terms of a legal survey system, metesand bounds orpolygon. The mineral zone description describes the minerals (substances) andsubsurface definition (zones/formations) that are included in the definition. For landrights, continuations may be described by generating a new Spatial description.LAND LEGAL DESCRIPTION ID: Unique sequence number identifying the land legaldescription.
Column Comment.1: SPATIAL DESCRIPTION OBSERVATION NUMBER: a unique series number for thespatial description, allowing the spatial description to be versioned over time.
Column Comment.2: PARCEL IDENTIFIER: Unique identifier for a parcel that describes a spatial object. Insome cases, it is convenient to make this ID the same as the ID for the parcel againstwhich it is validated (same as SP_PARCEL_XXX)
Column Comment.3: REMARK SEQ NO: Used to sequence components of the land parcel remark
Column Comment.4: ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating whether this row of data is currently eitheractive / valid (Y) or inactive / invalid (N).
Column Comment.5: EFFECTIVE DATE: The date that the data in this row first came into effect.
Column Comment.6: EXPIRY DATE: The date that the data in this row was no longer active or in effect.
Column Comment.7: ROW_MANAGEMENT_GUID: This value may be used to provide a global uniqueidentifier for this row of data. Use of this column is not mandatory, but if used,optional PPDM NOT NULL and UNIQUE INDEX constraints provided in the datamodel DDL should be created.
Column Comment.8: REMARK: Narrative remarks about this row of data.
Column Comment.9: REMARK DATE: Date remark was made.
Column Comment.10: SOURCE: The individual, company, agency, application or other source designatedas the source of information for this row.
Column Comment.11: ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
Column Comment.12: ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
Column Comment.13: ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
Column Comment.14: ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
Column Comment.15: ROW_EFFECTIVE_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of datais effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row of data wasmade available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.16: ROW_EXPIRY_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of data isno longer effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row ofdata was no longer available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.17: PPDM ROW QUALITY: A set of values indicating the quality of data in this row,usually with reference to the method or procedures used to load the data, althoughother types of quality reference are permitted.
